## The Non-Technical Cost of Decentralization

Decentralization introduces social, economic, and psychological costs that most builders are unwilling to bear. This essay explores the hidden burdens of building sovereign systems ‚Äî from user education to incentive misalignment ‚Äî and why these costs are often misattributed to ‚Äúbad UX‚Äù or ‚Äúearly tech.‚Äù
